header.description: Required Client ID for a Pogr Enabled Project
Required Build ID for a Pogr Enabled Project

request.description:
### Initiate Intake

This endpoint is used to initiate an intake process.

#### Request Body

| Field Name | Type | Required/Restrictions |
| --- | --- | --- |
| association_id | string | Required if bearer token is not passed in the header |

#### Response

- success (boolean): Indicates if the request was successful.
- payload
    - session_id (string): The ID of the initiated session.

#### Example

Request:

``` json
{
  "association_id": ""
}

```

Response:

``` json
{
  "success": true,
  "payload": {
    "session_id": ""
  }
}

```
